Content: *p75068a02436*do not write in this area do not write in this area do not write in this area2417 this question is about four isomers with the molecular formula c4h8o2.nameskeletal formulabutanoicacidooh4hydroxybutanalohohethyl ethanoateoo3hydroxybutanoneooh*(a) these four isomers can be identified using three chemical tests. each test gives a positive result for only one isomer. all three tests give a negative result for the fourth isomer. deduce the three chemical tests required. for each testidentify the reagentgive the positive observation in each testidentify the functional group of the isomer that gives the positive result.(6)
